com.yubico.jaas

Class HttpOathOtpLoginModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yubico.jaas.HttpOathOtpLoginModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoginModule

    public class HttpOathOtpLoginModule
extends Object
implements LoginModule
    A JAAS module for verifying OATH OTPs (One Time Passwords) using HTTP Basic Auth to a backend server doing the real authentication.
    Author:
    Fredrik Thulin
